name: Lime-Garlic Chicken and Spinach Salad
author: Cait F.
summary: This is a quick dish that's great for summer. I came up with it on a Thursday after school when Mom asked me to get dinner ready before she got home. Nice and light.
ingredients: 4  skinless, boneless chicken breast halves - cut into thin strips
¼ cup fresh lime juice, or to taste
directions: Place chicken, onions, garlic, salt, pepper, and flour in a resealable bag
Allow to sit for a few minutes to marinate
Spray a non-stick frying pan with olive oil cooking spray and place over medium heat
Pour in the entire contents of the bag and cook until the onion has softened (there is no need to brown)
Add additional lime juice to taste
